MemoryInfobox.description: 'In the name of friendship, Kassandra did the unthinkable. She snuck into Leda (Barnabas' daughter)|Leda's Leda's farm|farm to burn it to the ground, just so Barnabas and his daughter could be together again.'
MemoryInfobox.location: Sacred Plains of Demeter, Attika, Greece

General_Description: '''Demeter's Fire''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra sought to find a way to let [[Barnabas]] be with his daughter [[Leda (Barnabas' daughter)|Leda]].
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm doing this for you, Barnabas. I just hope you never find out.''
At night, Kassandra set the grain silos in [[Leda's farm]] alight.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''[[Greek mythology|Gods]] forgive me.''

After setting the whole farm ablaze, Kassandra watched nearby. Leda rushed to the scene, shocked.
*'''Leda:''' ''I can't believe it. Who would do this?''

<tabber>
|-|It was the gods.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You asked [[Demeter]] to send you a sign. I'd say this is it. She wants you to be with your father, Leda.''
*'''Leda:''' ''Demeter is right. She always is. Staying here means living in the past. My future is on the ocean, living the life my ''[[Leda (Barnabas' wife)|mater]]'' was meant to live. You still have room for one more on your crew?''
She offered her hand, and Kassandra clasped it with a smile.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Welcome aboard.''
|-|I did it.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It was me. I did it for Barnabas and I did it for you.''
Leda looked at her, aghast.
*'''Leda:''' ''I... After everything I worked for, everything I fought for. I will find a way to rebuild. And I will get my vengeance. Until then, get off my farm and ''never'' come back.''
Leda walked off, enraged, while Kassandra looked after her.
</tabber>
Section_Outcome: Kassandra snuck into Leda's farm and burned the grain silos to the ground. This led Leda to reconsider her life.
Section_Trivia:
*This is a 'hidden' quest, in that the only way to trigger it is to set one of Leda's silos on fire.
*It is unknown{{Cite|25 Nov 2020. Needs confirmation}} if Leda follows up on her promise to rebuild and seek vengeance if Kassandra confesses to burning the farm.
*If players set fire to the silos before starting the quest "[[Odyssey Into the Past]]", the end cutscene will play immediately after completing "[[Daddy's Home]]".
*Demeter's Fire is a word play on "{{Wiki|St. Elmo's Fire}}"
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
